resources.string: Here you can Report about bugs ,issues and give suggestions by your valuable feedback

Here we have a new app comes among you guys if you are looking for friends or family members where he/she exactly is, now you can find them in very easy way. this app is basically for family members and close friends whom you want to find them in a seconds.
this app based on google map service which locate your location as well as your friends and families members location, it has following services..

it has two ways of finding location either by email id through which user has registered or by number simply you have to enter the number of user whom you want find their location in the search box and you will get the result according to the given input.

if you might looking for person location then u could get the result but it has some circumstances such that the user whom you looking for their location must be join with our app otherwise you will not able to get the location of that user
Basically in this category all the user information will be contain here He/She can change basic information like changing the user password and numbers.

In this block,you will get the location of all users and family members who are in your contact list and according to their current location you will locate them all of users in a same block so, in this manner, no you required to get each of people location to find them

My self vivek ranjan, i am of third year student and currently doing B.Tech from L.N.J.P.I.T college of chapra from computer science engineering branch, i am highly optimised with your valuable feedback about this app and i am recommend each of my colleague friends to share with all of their friends with a great remarks and give me strength to build such wonderful application. at last thanks all of you guys who support me to do this..
Keep Touch with the families and friends. In this category you will be to get friends and family location based on your contact list.
Personal information such as name,mobile number, email and so on mention here, you can modify it based on your need
In Seconds you can get location with quick and easy steps just follow the guided steps
